ModMetaData.name: SimpleSidearms - CE1.6 Patch - Dev Build
ModMetaData.author: Dyrewulfe
ModMetaData.description: A patch for Simple Sidearms and CE 1.6. Fixes issues with melee weapon selection when auto-swapping. (This is the dev version of SimpleSidearms - CE1.6 Patch. The release version of About.xml is available for editing at About/About-Release.xml. Edits made on this file or on the temporary About/About.xml won't show up on the release version. Use VisualStudio to build a "Release" version of this mod when ready to upload your mod!)
